title: Dexter's Laboratory
description: Dexter is a boy genius who secretly operates a high-tech laboratory hidden behind his bookshelf. With his hyper-intelligent mind and inventions, he battles rivals, thwarts his sister Dee Dee’s chaos, and navigates childhood.

title: Rugrats
description: Follows a group of adventurous toddlers—Tommy, Chuckie, and twins Phil and Lil—as they navigate the world from their pint-sized perspectives, turning everyday events into grand adventures.

title: The Powerpuff Girls
description: Three kindergarten-aged girls—Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup—were created by accident but use their superpowers to save the city of Townsville from mad scientists, aliens, and giant monsters.

title: Animaniacs
description: Join Yakko, Wakko, and Dot—three zany siblings living in the Warner Bros. water tower—as they wreak havoc, parody pop culture, and teach lessons through hilarious and chaotic skits.

title: Samurai Jack
description: Trapped in a dystopian future by the evil demon Aku, a noble samurai named Jack journeys across strange lands in a mission to return to the past and restore peace to the world.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
description: Bruce Wayne fights crime as the mysterious and brooding Batman, facing off against a rogues' gallery including the Joker, Mr. Freeze, and Catwoman in this dark, stylized take on Gotham City.

title: Inspector Gadget
description: Inspector Gadget is a bumbling cyborg detective equipped with an array of gadgets. He battles the sinister Dr. Claw, often unaware of the real help coming from his niece Penny and her dog Brain.

title: Pinky and the Brain
description: Two lab mice—one genius, one not—try to take over the world every night. Brain devises clever plans, while Pinky's antics lead to hilarious failures. A clever spin-off from Animaniacs.

title: Johnny Bravo
description: Johnny is a muscle-bound guy with an Elvis voice and an ego to match. He's constantly trying to impress women—usually with hilarious failure—while parodying action heroes and pop culture.

title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
description: Prince Adam transforms into the mighty He-Man to protect the realm of Eternia from the evil Skeletor. With allies like Teela and Man-At-Arms, it's a battle of good vs. evil with magical weapons and creatures.

title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
description: Chip and Dale form a detective agency with Gadget, Monterey Jack, and Zipper. They solve tiny crimes often missed by the human world, facing off against mischievous foes in clever capers.

title: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
description: Five teens from around the world wield rings representing the elements to summon Captain Planet, a superhero who fights pollution. Each episode tackled environmental and social issues of the time.

title: MASK
description: The Mobile Armored Strike Kommand battles the evil V.E.N.O.M. using transforming vehicles and special masks that grant unique powers. A blend of G.I. Joe and Transformers-style action.

title: Biker Mice from Mars
description: Three anthropomorphic mice from Mars ride motorcycles and fight against industrial pollution and the Plutarkians on Earth. Packed with action, humor, and 90s rock attitude.

title: She-Ra: Princess of Power
description: Adora, twin sister of He-Man, transforms into She-Ra to lead the Great Rebellion against the evil Hordak and free Etheria from tyranny. A powerful female heroine with magical sword and allies.

title: SilverHawks
description: A group of cyborg heroes with metal bodies and wings patrol the galaxy, battling Mon*Star and his gang. Action-packed and futuristic, often seen as the space counterpart to ThunderCats.

title: Care Bears
description: Living in the magical land of Care-a-Lot, these cuddly bears teach lessons about kindness and emotions using the power of their belly badges. A colorful series focused on empathy and love.

title: Rainbow Brite
description: Rainbow Brite uses her magical belt to bring color and joy to the universe, fighting the gloom spread by villains like Murky Dismal. A bright, optimistic show with themes of friendship and courage.

title: My Little Pony
description: In Dream Valley, magical ponies embark on whimsical adventures while protecting their land from witches, goblins, and other threats. Promotes kindness, imagination, and teamwork.

title: The Adventures of Teddy Ruxpin
description: Teddy Ruxpin and his friends journey across the magical land of Grundo, uncovering ancient secrets and spreading friendship. Based on the popular talking toy of the same name.

title: Garfield and Friends
description: Join the lasagna-loving, nap-taking cat Garfield, his hapless owner Jon, and dim-witted dog Odie in a mix of sarcastic humor and wacky farm animal skits. Based on the comic strip by Jim Davis.

title: Bionic Six
description: A family enhanced with bionic powers fights crime and protects Earth from evil scientist Dr. Scarab. Each member has unique powers in this blend of family values and futuristic action.

title: Centurions
description: Three elite heroes wear exo-frame suits that fuse them with advanced weaponry. Together, they combat the techno-villain Doc Terror and his robotic minions to save the planet.

title: Dungeons & Dragons
description: A group of teenagers is transported into a fantasy realm where they become magical heroes. Guided by the mysterious Dungeon Master, they try to find a way home while battling Venger and Tiamat.

title: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
description: The elite G.I. Joe team wages war against Cobra, a ruthless terrorist organization bent on world domination. Action-packed episodes, cool vehicles, and famous 'knowing is half the battle' PSAs.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Four mutated turtles—Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael—train in ninjutsu to battle crime in New York City. Guided by Master Splinter, they fight Shredder and the Foot Clan.

title: Visionaries: Knights of the Magical Light
description: On a post-technological planet, warriors wield staffs that summon animal totems and elemental magic. The Spectral Knights battle the evil Darkling Lords in a struggle of mysticism and valor.
